name: AD&D Dark Sun Online: Crimson Sands
summary: Dark Sun Online was part of the first wave of graphical MMORPG's. It used the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons 2nd Edition ruleset and the same engine as the 1994 single player Dark Sun game.
